description:
Lina, Zelgadis, and Filia take to the sea to locate Gourry. They soon find themselves battling hordes of ghosts in exchange for the chance to claim a rare and powerful jar.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Grosse frayeur ! L`horreur de la jarre maudite !
Pandemonium! Terror of the Cursed Jar!
喧々囂々! 呪われた壷の恐怖!
